MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH2 postcode area of Hoole, Chester, affecting properties Law Street, Westminster Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 04:48AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 09:45AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.59AM on 25th January 2021
